title: Spinel cobalt-based binary metal oxides as emerging materials for energy harvesting devices: synthesis, characterization and synchrotron radiation-enabled investigation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21180-21189
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03462G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Abdelelah Alshanableh, Yusuf Selim Ocak, Bashar Aljawrneh, Borhan Aldeen Albiss, Khaled Shawakfehc, Latif U. Khane, Messaoud Harfouchee, Saja Alrousan
The synthesis and synchrotron-based characterization of MCo2O4 with 3d-transition metal ions (Ni, Fe, Cu, Zn) were explored using a hydrothermal process, revealing distinct morphologies and promising potential as counter electrodes for DSSCs.
